title.rendered: Get to know the Samsung Galaxy A71

content.rendered:
Smartphones are more desirable than ever before and once you get to know the Samsung Galaxy A71, we’re sure you’ll find your perfect match. This device is perfect for anyone who’s wanting to stick to a budget but enjoy the finer things in life. You don’t have to choose one over the other. With our market leading Samsung Galaxy A71 deals, you’ll be even more convinced!

 

A phone never looked so good

Large screens are something that are almost essential in 2020. With the Galaxy A71, you can enjoy a 6.7 inch Infinity O display. Large screens allow us to enjoy things at a much larger, detailed view. Something that Samsung has done to offer a view larger than ever before is removing the bezels from the edge of the screen. This means that you can use every inch of this display to enjoy the things you love. They’ve even reduced the selfie camera to a tiny punch hole! With such a high quality screen, it’s easy to see why people are loving this phone.

Smooth, curved edges bring that overall high quality design over to the back of the phone too. With a glossy finish, this device is perfect for everyday whilst showing off a high end style. A patterned design on the phone adds that much more excitement and creates a smartphone unlike ever before. Every part of the patterned design will catch the light and offer a slightly different hue of your chosen colour. It’s a great touch from Samsung! You won’t be able to find a smartphone with a design like this, it’s so unique. 

You’re able to purchase the Samsung Galaxy A71 in Prism Crush Black, Blue and SIlver. With these colour options, you’re given the chance to choose something that works with your style perfectly. They’re all incredibly understated colours that offer nothing but class in it’s design. Expressing yourself through your phone has never been so easy to achieve. Each of these editions is going to allow for a very tied together look, no matter what you’re doing.

 

Check out the Samsung Galaxy A71 camera

On the back of the Samsung Galaxy A71, you can find a quad lens camera. For an affordable smartphone, this is huge! This camera consists of a 64MP main camera, 5MP depth lens, 12MP ultra wide lens and a 5MP macro sensor. The main lens is what you’ll be using the most. It allows for a regular angle whilst capturing huge amounts of detail in one photo. The ultra wide lens is also something to pay attention to. It offers a 123 degree angle to shoot in. This is perfect for fitting more into one frame. 

If you’re wanting to get a little more creative, the macro and depth lenses will be your best friends. Using the macro lens, you’ll be able to shoot with more clarity than ever before. This lens is made to capture images up close. When you do this, you’ll be able to photograph the finest of details in high resolution. Paired with Bokeh from the depth sensor, you’ll have a photo to scream about. Using a depth lens, you’ll be able to soften the background of a photo to isolate the subject. It creates an image that pops out against the rest and allows you to get creative.

With such a powerful rear camera, we’re sure you’re expecting the same from the selfie camera. You aren\’t going to be let down. Tucked into the tiny punch hole in the front of the Galaxy A71 is a 32MP selfie camera. We’ll warn you now, it’s an impressive one. Every single selfie you take is going to be high resolution and hole hundreds of different details. By softening the background on your selfies, you can even make sure that you’re popping out more than ever before.

 

There’s a lot to love

Behind the power of the Samsung Galaxy A71 is a 4500mAh battery, capable of some big things. With the Samsung Galaxy A71, you can stream, game and even talk all day. Just one full battery will allow you to go the entire day without worrying about a dead phone. When you do need to charge up the phone, it supports 25W super fast charging. This means that you’ll be able to power up quicker than ever before so you can go about your day. 

You’ll only get one option when it comes to internal memory, being 128GB. This is more than enough storage for the average person and allows you to hold more inside your phone. You won’t have to worry about deleting data to make space for more. THere is also the option to use a microSD card to add up to 512GB of external memory. Whilst this device already has a huge memory option, this adds way more value to your phone.

Something Samsung is constantly doing is coming up with ways to make their smartphones different to everyone else\’s. One way they do this is by introducing new features to their devices, such as Game Booster. This phone will learn your usage and optimise a number of different features so that you can have the smoothest graphics, extended battery life and even higher quality audio. It’s perfect for gaming fanatics!

 

WAIT…the price!

Samsung have never priced their A range particularly high. This is the range that is meant to be affordable. If you want a mobile phone contract that doesn’t break the bank, the A71 is perfect for you. This desirable new smartphone comes with an extremely low price tag. With a low monthly cost, you can put money into the things that matter more. Quality doesn’t have to be expensive and the Galaxy A71 proves that completely. 

 

Even if the Samsung Galaxy A71 doesn’t sound like something you would enjoy, you can’t deny it’s an impressive handset. There are so many other choices if this isn\’t the one for you. Whether you’re on the lookout for something new or something cheap, we’ve got what you need.
